name: Bug Souls
description:
Bug Souls

Mini soulslike about bugs and mushrooms!

Objective :

Defend magic mushroom from waves of enemies!

Controls :

  • movement - wsad, left analog,
  • camera - mouse, right analog,
  • attack - LMB, Cross/A
  • block - RMB, Circle/B
  • lock on - MMB/LShift, Square/X
  • quit - Alt+F4
